attributes.action: Students Should not have homework as its takes up their time away from school.
attributes.additional_details: School holidays are also a problem as many people like to go on holiday and homework interferes with that!
attributes.background: Students Shouldn't have homework as it takes up too much of their free time out of school. When school has ended you should be able to relax and not work. School is for working not home. School holidays are also a problem as many people like to go on holiday and homework interferes with that!
